properties.areaDesc: Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal from 10 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 8 at 2:19PM PST until January 9 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts to 35 kt and
combined seas around 10 feet expected when conditions are worst.

* WHERE...Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal from 10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 AM to 9 PM PST Thursday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will create dangerous sea conditions
which could capsize or damage small and large vessels.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THURSDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 9 PM PST THURSDAY
